lines.text: Hey. Look at this, how is it they always get here before we do?
No, that was a rhetorical question, David. That was one to which I didn't really expect an answer.
You know me Curtis, I think most of them will look better in plastic-zipper suits. You got the smoke?
No, I think it's something like fingerprints, we can just guess... Yeah, I brought the smoke.
I wanna be a lawyer, just like mommy.
I thought you wanted to be a doctor, like me.
I'm telling you that your formula works, and you're telling me about rats.
Okay... okay, I want you in my lab. I need uh, full blood work, an EKG, full respiratory - and a brain scan wouldn't be a bad idea. Make sure you have one.
